description: Design practice in light of background of shifting production languages, convergent technologies & professional design contexts. Fundamental graphic applications for print technologies & principles of print, page anatomy & construction, design production literacies & requirements for application to screen design. Role of process in design & roles & responsibilities inherent in design production processes.
incompatible: DECO7220 or IENV7962 or MMDS2200 or MMDS7962
